body_html:
On your comments about layers.linear, sorry, I'm not sure if I follow. I thought the code does what we want: It first reshape the 3D tensor to [-1, last_dimension] here, do the transformation, and put back into the original 3D shape here.

@lmthang You are completely right, my apologies!
